PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AirTerminalPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Air terminal performance history common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: SupplyAirTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Supply air temperature in heating mode.

PropertyDef.Name: SupplyAirTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Supply air temperature in cooling mode.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureDrop
PropertyDef.Definition:
Pressure drop.
Drop in total pressure between inlet and outlet at nominal air-flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: InductionRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: Induction ratio versus distance from the diffuser and its discharge direction; induction ratio (or entrainment ratio) is the ratio of the volumetric flow rate in the jet to the volumetric flow rate at the air terminal.

PropertyDef.Name: CenterlineAirVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: Centerline air velocity versus distance from the diffuser and temperature differential; a function of distance from diffuser and temperature difference between supply air and room air.
